sentences.sentence: Two attacks on Friday killed three people and wounded five others, including Italian and British tourists, in recent surge of violence.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: China has launched three days of military drills around Taiwan in what is described as a stern warning following this week's visit to the United States by Taiwanese President Tsai Ing-wen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Taiwan in response carried out these countermaneuvers, with its defense ministry describing the Chinese operation as an irrational act that has jeopardized regional security and stability.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tsai met with the U.S. House Speaker Kevin McCarthy during a visit to California, in defiance of Chinese warnings not to.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Chinese exercises include maritime maneuvers designed, analysts say, to show the ability to impose an economic blockade of the island.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Beijing disputes Taiwan's claim to independence from mainland China.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Three people have died and at least five were injured after two attacks on Friday, according to Israeli authorities. Early Friday evening, an Italian tourist was killed and Italian and British citizens were among the wounded when a car rammed into a group of tourists in Israel's capital. In an earlier incident, two British-Israeli sisters were shot dead and their mother was seriously wounded near a settlement in the occupied West Bank. There was no claim to the attacks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tension has been continually rising this year. Early on Friday morning, Israel unleashed airstrikes on Lebanon and bombed the Gaza Strip. Later, both sides were showing signs of trying to keep border hostilities under control. However, the midday prayers at Jerusalem's Al-Aqsa Mosque were peacefully held despite violence in recent days.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The recent wave of violence was triggered when Israeli police stormed the mosque earlier this week, causing unrest in Jerusalem and outrage across the Arab world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Ukrainian military claims to have shot down a Russian Su-25 ground attack jet near

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Marinka in the Donetsk region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: A video was released on Friday that officials say shows the pilot ejecting before the plane hits the ground and explodes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: However, Russia hasn't confirmed the loss of a fighter plane.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The Moscow-serving mayor of Donetsk, Alexei Kolemzin, confirmed that one person died and six others were injured during Ukrainian shelling in the city of Sleviensk.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He says 15 cities and villages on the front line were shelled on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Elsewhere in the region, in the town of Siversk, 100 kilometers from Donetsk, there's been no drinking water, gas, electricity or communications for almost a year, according to the regional administration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: It comes as the fight for Bakhmut intensifies and Ukraine forces say they're holding out.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The funeral has been held in Moscow for the Russian blogger Vladlen Tatarski, who was killed in a bomb explosion at a public meeting in St. Petersburg.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Tatarski was a fervent supporter of Russia's invasion of Ukraine and posted from the front line giving support and advice to Russian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: and posted from the front line giving support and advice to Russian troops.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A 26-year-old woman, Daria Trapova, has been accused of the killing and charged with terrorism offences.

sentences.sentence: Fans of Silvio Berlusconi's football club Monza gathered outside the hospital where he's being treated in the Italian city of Milan.

sentences.sentence: The former Italian prime minister vowed on Friday to survive his illness.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The 86-year-old showed signs of improvement as he received treatment for leukemia and a lung infection.
